definitions: a person in charge of horses or other livestock on a ranch.
shortDefinitions: person in charge of horses or other livestock on ranch

definitions: a person who trains and takes care of the animals used in a movie

examples.text: they had three cow wranglers to help with the scene

shortDefinitions: person who trains and takes care of animals on film set

definitions: a person engaging in a lengthy and complicated quarrel or dispute

examples.text: he was known as the wrangler for the aplomb with which he skewered the professors

shortDefinitions: person engaging in lengthy and complicated dispute
